name: font-converter
title: Font Converter
description: Convert between TTF, OTF, WOFF, and WOFF2 font formats
content:
Overview

This application converts fonts between different formats including TTF, OTF, WOFF, and WOFF2. Built using fonttools, it provides reliable font format conversion for web and desktop use.

Features

  • Convert between TTF, OTF, WOFF, and WOFF2 formats
  • Preserves all font glyphs and metadata
  • Optimized for web fonts (WOFF/WOFF2)
  • Maintains original filename with new extension

Parameters

  • Input Font: Upload your font file from stash
  • Output Format: Select TTF, OTF, WOFF, or WOFF2
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a converted font file with the same base name but new extension in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Converting desktop fonts to web formats (WOFF/WOFF2)
  • Standardizing font formats across projects
  • Preparing fonts for web performance optimization
  • Converting between TTF and OTF for compatibility
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python "prod_apps/python/font_converter.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -f "${outputFormat}"
